java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.astronomy.coordinates.GalacticCoordinate
public class GalacticCoordinate extends Object
Galactic coordinate system. l: Galactic longitude (0Â° toward Galactic center, increases counterclockwise) b: Galactic latitude (0Â° = Galactic plane, +90Â° = North Galactic Pole)
